options.content:
# Thoth Knowledge Graph content metrics Grafana Dashboard

This dashboard contains all metrics focused on the knowledge collected in the database.

## Variables

The variables you can change are described below. For specific overlays they are clustered togheter and you need to set them all to see all metrics belonging to that overlay.

### moc/smaug

- *instance*: `metrics-exporter-thoth-infra-prod.apps.smaug.na.operate-first.cloud`

targets.expr: thoth_graphdb_total_python_packages_per_indexes{field="$instance", index_url="https://pypi.org/simple"} / ignoring(index_url, stats_type) group_right thoth_pypi_stats{stats_type="packages", field="$instance"}

panels.title: Thoth Python Packages respect to PyPI
Thoth Python Packages Releases respect to PyPI
Solved Python Packages Releases no error
Solved Python Packages Releases with error (general)
Solved Python Packages Releases no error [%]
Solved Python Packages Releases with error (general) [%]
Solved Python Packages Releases with error (unsolvable) [%]
SI Not Analyzable Python Packages Releases

targets.legendFormat: Solved Python Packages with no error: {{solver_name}}

panels.title: Info about Solved Python Packages for all Solvers

targets.legendFormat: Solved Python Packages with solver error (unsolvable=False, unparseable=False)): {{solver_name}}
Solved Python Packages with solver error (unsolvable=TRUE): {{solver_name}}
Solved Python Packages with solver error (unparseable=TRUE): {{solver_name}}

panels.title: Info about Solved Python Packages for all Solvers with errors

targets.legendFormat: Number of External Software Environment for Run

panels.title: Software Environment (Build and Run) and Hardware

Number of Software Environment for Build
